name: Block Fighters (itch)
description:
Gameplay

- Fight against red blocks.
- Defend your blue circle.

Content
 - Play story levels
 - Local Multiplayer
 - Hardcore mode and others.
 - Cutomize your blocks. Change colors, skins, shape, weight, speed, name.
 - Buy upgrades.

Free Download on Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.TStudioGames.BlockFighters

Made by TStudioGames
